Uses of Interface
playn.core.Layer

  • Packages that use Layer 
    Package Description
    playn.core  
    playn.core.canvas  
    playn.core.gl  

    • Uses of Layer in playn.core

      Subinterfaces of Layer in playn.core 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  GroupLayer
      GroupLayer creates a Layer hierarchy by maintaining an ordered group of child Layers.
      static interface  GroupLayer.Clipped
      A clipped group layer.
      interface  ImageLayer
      A layer that displays a bitmapped image.
      interface  ImmediateLayer
      Represents a layer that enables direct rendering into the framebuffer.
      static interface  ImmediateLayer.Clipped
      An immediate layer that is clipped to a specified bounds.
      static interface  Layer.HasSize
      Interface for Layers containing explicit sizes.
      interface  SurfaceLayer
      Represents a layer that maintains an off-screen texture into which one can render by calling methods on SurfaceLayer.surface().
      Classes in playn.core that implement Layer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractLayer
      Base Layer implementation shared among platforms (to avoid reinventing the transform logic).
      Methods in playn.core that return Layer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Layer GroupLayer.get(int index)
      Returns the layer at the specified index.
      Layer Events.Position.hit()
      The layer that was hit when generating this event, or null if the event is currently being processed by the global listener.
      Layer Events.Position.Impl.hit() 
      Layer GroupLayerImpl.hitTest(GroupLayer self, pythagoras.f.Point point) 
      Layer Layer.HitTester.hitTest(Layer layer, pythagoras.f.Point p)
      Returns layer, or a child of layer if the supplied coordinate (which is in layer's coordinate system) hits layer, or one of its children.
      Layer Layer.hitTest(pythagoras.f.Point p)
      Tests whether the supplied (layer relative) point "hits" this layer or any of its children.
      Layer AbstractLayer.hitTest(pythagoras.f.Point p) 
      Layer Layer.hitTestDefault(pythagoras.f.Point p)
      Like hitTest(pythagoras.f.Point) except that it ignores a configured Layer.HitTester.
      Layer AbstractLayer.hitTestDefault(pythagoras.f.Point p) 
      Layer Layer.setAlpha(float alpha)
      Sets the alpha component of this layer's current tint.
      Layer AbstractLayer.setAlpha(float alpha) 
      Layer Layer.setDepth(float depth)
      Sets the depth of this layer.
      Layer AbstractLayer.setDepth(float depth) 
      Layer Layer.setHitTester(Layer.HitTester tester)
      Configures a custom hit tester for this layer.
      Layer AbstractLayer.setHitTester(Layer.HitTester tester) 
      Layer Layer.setInteractive(boolean interactive)
      Configures this layer as reactive to clicks and touches, or not.
      Layer AbstractLayer.setInteractive(boolean interactive) 
      Layer Layer.setOrigin(float x, float y)
      Sets the origin of the layer.
      Layer AbstractLayer.setOrigin(float x, float y) 
      Layer Layer.setRotation(float angle)
      Sets the current rotation of this layer, in radians.
      Layer AbstractLayer.setRotation(float angle) 
      Layer Layer.setScale(float scale)
      Sets the current x and y scale of this layer to scale..
      Layer AbstractLayer.setScale(float s) 
      Layer Layer.setScale(float scaleX, float scaleY)
      Sets the current x and y scale of this layer.
      Layer AbstractLayer.setScale(float sx, float sy) 
      Layer Layer.setScaleX(float scaleX)
      Sets the current x scale of this layer.
      Layer AbstractLayer.setScaleX(float sx) 
      Layer Layer.setScaleY(float scaleY)
      Sets the current y scale of this layer.
      Layer AbstractLayer.setScaleY(float sy) 
      Layer Layer.setShader(GLShader shader)
      Configures a custom shader for use when rendering this layer (and its children).
      Layer AbstractLayer.setShader(GLShader shader) 
      Layer Layer.setTint(int tint)
      Sets the tint for this layer, as ARGB.
      Layer AbstractLayer.setTint(int tint) 
      Layer Layer.setTranslation(float x, float y)
      Sets the x and y translation of this layer.
      Layer AbstractLayer.setTranslation(float x, float y) 
      Layer Layer.setTx(float tx)
      Sets the x translation of this layer.
      Layer AbstractLayer.setTx(float x) 
      Layer Layer.setTy(float ty)
      Sets the y translation of this layer.
      Layer AbstractLayer.setTy(float y) 
      Layer Layer.setVisible(boolean visible)
      Configures this layer's visibility: if true, it will be rendered as normal, if false it and its children will not be rendered.
      Layer AbstractLayer.setVisible(boolean visible) 
      Methods in playn.core with parameters of type Layer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GroupLayer.add(Layer layer)
      Adds a layer to the bottom of the group.
      void GroupLayerImpl.addAt(GroupLayer self, Layer layer, float tx, float ty) 
      void GroupLayer.addAt(Layer layer, float tx, float ty)
      Adds the supplied layer to this group layer, adjusting its translation (relative to this group layer) to the supplied values.
      void TouchImpl.cancelLayerTouches(Layer except) 
      void Touch.cancelLayerTouches(Layer except)
      Cancels all currently active touch interactions on layers.
      int GroupLayerImpl.depthChanged(GroupLayer self, Layer layer, float oldDepth) 
      void ParentLayer.depthChanged(Layer layer, float oldDepth)
      Called by a Layer when its depth changes.
      Surface Surface.drawLayer(Layer layer)
      Renders the supplied scene graph into this surface.
      Layer Layer.HitTester.hitTest(Layer layer, pythagoras.f.Point p)
      Returns layer, or a child of layer if the supplied coordinate (which is in layer's coordinate system) hits layer, or one of its children.
      static pythagoras.f.Point Layer.Util.layerToParent(Layer layer, Layer parent, float x, float y)
      Converts the supplied point from coordinates relative to the specified child layer to coordinates relative to the specified parent layer.
      static pythagoras.f.Point Layer.Util.layerToParent(Layer layer, Layer parent, pythagoras.f.IPoint point, pythagoras.f.Point into)
      Converts the supplied point from coordinates relative to the specified child layer to coordinates relative to the specified parent layer.
      static pythagoras.f.Point Layer.Util.layerToScreen(Layer layer, float x, float y)
      Converts the supplied point from coordinates relative to the specified layer to screen coordinates.
      static pythagoras.f.Point Layer.Util.layerToScreen(Layer layer, pythagoras.f.IPoint point, pythagoras.f.Point into)
      Converts the supplied point from coordinates relative to the specified layer to screen coordinates.
      Touch.Event.Impl Touch.Event.Impl.localize(Layer hit) 
      Pointer.Event.Impl Pointer.Event.Impl.localize(Layer hit)

      static pythagoras.f.Point Layer.Util.parentToLayer(Layer layer, pythagoras.f.IPoint point, pythagoras.f.Point into)
      Converts the supplied point from coordinates relative to its parent to coordinates relative to the specified layer.
      static pythagoras.f.Point Layer.Util.parentToLayer(Layer parent, Layer layer, pythagoras.f.IPoint point, pythagoras.f.Point into)
      Converts the supplied point from coordinates relative to the specified parent to coordinates relative to the specified child layer.
      void GroupLayer.remove(Layer layer)
      Removes a layer from the group.
      static pythagoras.f.Point Layer.Util.screenToLayer(Layer layer, float x, float y)
      Converts the supplied point from screen coordinates to coordinates relative to the specified layer.
